name: GenerateSessionSummaries
description:
Generate AI summaries for session recordings.

Use this tool to create AI-generated summaries for a group of session recordings, identifying patterns and generating a comprehensive notebook.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve it by calling the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_id_list
parameters.description: List of session IDs to be summarized, with a maximum of 300 IDs.

value_schema.description: List of session IDs to summarize (max 300)

parameters.name: summarization_focus_area
parameters.description: Optional focus area for the summarization to guide the AI in highlighting specific patterns or information.

value_schema.description: Optional focus area for the summarization

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: session_ids
parameters.description: List of session IDs to summarize (max 300)

value_schema.description: List of session IDs to summarize (max 300)

parameters.name: focus_area
parameters.description: Optional focus area for the summarization

value_schema.description: Optional focus area for the summarization
